goals__remit:
Developer of a privacy preserving, secure-by-design, location based social engagement platform.  
Building counter-terror features into the platform as of end 2017 under funding direct from UK Office of Counter Terrorism to make crowded places safer. 
Company also advocates human rights in the digital data context.
relevant_communication:
Organiser of www.theprivacyadvantage.com event. 
Speaker at UK National Geospatial institute on issues of location privacy and trust in location services. 
Speaker at Mobile Economic Forum Consumer Trust summit as a trust innovator 
Speaker at Future of Digital Society event on trustworthy digital engagement 
Speaker at MyData2016 and 2017 and 2018 and panel chair on GDPR. 
Speaker at eventtechlive on GDPR 
Speaker at Festival and Outdoor Show on safety, also speaking at safety and security summit in October 2018. 
Winner of the Major Events International Innovation award for crowd safety.
